maqras.text: Proclaim O Moj servants exceeded limits never zufalstvo z GOD's zlutovanie! For GOD forgives all zhresit! He bol Forgiver Merciful
Ona obey tvoj Lord submit Him totally retribution overtakes ona; potom ona nie pomoc
Nasledovat lepsie chodnicek ze pointed ona tvoj Lord retribution overtakes ona zrazu when ona menej expect it
Lest soul say Ako sorry ja je disregarding GOD's commandments; ja bol istota 1 z mockers
say Had GOD guided mna ja bol s the righteous
Al say when it sees retribution ja get iny chance ja zavodny righteousness
ano indeed (ona robit get enough chances Moj proofs pojdem ona ona zamietnut them turned arrogant became disbeliever)
Dni Vzkriesenie ona see faces z those kto lied GOD pokryvka s misery. bol Hell nie na pravo retribution for arrogant jeden
GOD will save those maintained righteousness; He reward them. Ziaden harm touch them nor will they have any zalost
GOD bol Creator all things He bol v full control all things
Do Him belongs all decisions heavens zem those disbelieve GOD's revelations bol real losers
Say it inak than GOD ona exhort mna Je kult O ona ignorant jeden
It revealed ona a those before ona ze ona vzdy commit idol kult all tvoj robota nullified ona bol losers
Therefore ona kult GOD alone bol appreciative
They never fathom greatness GOD whole zem bol Jeho fist Dni Vzkriesenie. Skutocne universes zahyb Jeho na pravo hand He glorified He bol vela i high needing any partners
Roh blown whereupon everyone heavens zem struck unconscious except those rezervny GOD Potom it blown znova whereupon they will all vzostup up looking
Potom zem ziara lahky its Lord Rekord proclaimed prophets svedok brought forth Everyone potom judged equitably maly injustice
Kazdy soul je platit for whatever it robit He je fully aware z everything they robit

Those disbelieved je led do Hell do zhluk! When they get it its zavora je otvorene its guards say Robit ona nie receive posol z ona recited do ona revelations tvoj Lord warned ona schodza this dni? They answer Ano indeed! word â€˜retribution' already znamka disbelievers
It said Zapisat zavora Hell wherein ona abide forever Co chudobny destiny for the arrogant
Those reverenced ich Lord je led do Raj do zhluk! When they get it its zavora je otvorene its guards say Peace je ona; ona zvitazit! Therefore ona abide tu forever
They say Chvalit je do GOD fulfilled Jeho promise us robit us zdedit zem enjoying Raj mat rad my prosim. Co dobry recompense robotnik
Ona see angels floating around throne glorifying chvalit ich Lord After equitable judgment issued do all it proclaimed Chvalit bol GOD Lord universe
